mean_en: the fact of stopping work because you have reached a particular age; the time when you do this; the period of your life after you have stopped work at a particular age
sentence: Some people look forward to retirement but I'm afraid it will be boring.
sentence_trans: 有些人期待着退休，但我觉得那会很无聊。
word_etyma: re回、向后 + tire 疲劳 + ment表示行为、行为的过程或结果 → 退休，引退，退却，撤退
